description:
A vampire who loves strip rock-paper-scissors issues a challenge to the Hunters Guild, and the hunters are left exposed.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Chifoumi citoyen / La fadeur du bras d`acier / Le souverain de la plage
Citizen Baseball Kane / The Left Hand of Iron Is Kind of Boring / Emperor of the Shore
Shimin Yakyuu Kane / Tetsu no Hidarite Imaichi Jimi de / Nagisa no Teiou-sama
市民野球ケーン / 鉄の左手イマイチ地味で / 渚の帝王様
